property.name: ariaLabelText
property.label: Aria label text
property.description: Provides more context as to what the button interaction is doing.

property.name: elementId
property.label: Element Id
property.description: The unique identifier of the button. This is optional - if no ID is passed, one will be generated.

property.name: htmlType
property.label: HTML type
property.description: The native HTML button type the button should use. If no htmlType is passed, it will default to 'button'.

property.name: label
property.label: Label
property.description: Text to be displayed within the button.

property.name: url
property.label: Target URL
property.description: URL the button will take the user to when clicked.

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
